Sentencas: In this study, doped ceria solid electrolyte materials Ce 0.8M0.2O2-delta (M = Gd, Sm, and Nd) for intermediate temperature-solid oxide fuel cells were synthesized through citrate-nitrate auto combustion method.
Titulo: Ceria-Based Solid Electrolytes for IT-SOFC Applications

Sentencas: They were then characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscope (SEM), and Fourier transform infrared (FT-IR) techniques.
Titulo: Ceria-Based Solid Electrolytes for IT-SOFC Applications

Sentencas: XRD results show that all the synthesized powders indicate a single-phase with cubic fluorite structure.
Titulo: Ceria-Based Solid Electrolytes for IT-SOFC Applications

Sentencas: Electrolytes with high density were obtained by sintering the samples at 1400 degrees C for 6 h. The mean crystallite sizes were calculated using the Scherrer formula.
Titulo: Ceria-Based Solid Electrolytes for IT-SOFC Applications

Sentencas: Surface morphologies of all the sintered electrolytes were obtained by using SEM.
Titulo: Ceria-Based Solid Electrolytes for IT-SOFC Applications

Sentencas: The total ionic conductivity of all electrolytes was measured from the impedance analysis in 300-700 degrees C temperature range.
Titulo: Ceria-Based Solid Electrolytes for IT-SOFC Applications

Sentencas: The ionic conductivities at 700 degrees C are in the order of Ce 0.8Sm0.2O2-delta >Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta >Ce0.8Nd0.2O2-delta, and their corresponding activation energies are found to be 0.61, 0.62, and 0.67 eV, respectively.
Titulo: Ceria-Based Solid Electrolytes for IT-SOFC Applications
